Description:
Required skills to be successful:  Strong analytical skills. 
 Desire to build relationship with existing & potential clients & agents. 
Excellent communication and negotiation skills.
A driven sales approach that ensures targets are met
Excellent interpersonal skills to develop relationships with internal and external stakeholders.
Problem solving abilities. What equips you for the role:  Over 12 years of experience in Insurance Industry (Including 5+ years in a leadership role)
 General Insurance with particular emphasis on Marine, Hull & Cargo, Non Marine, Motor, Life & Medical.
 Agent / Broker Relationship Management.
 Knowledge of the Insurance industry and experience in UAE market.
 Commercial acumen and strong understanding of business requirements 
 Interpersonal and negotiations skills.
 Bachelor’s / Master’s Degree (Commerce/Science / Arts / Business Administration)   
 Associate of Chartered Insurance Institute, London or equivalentJob Details
